trends: There have been no other sightings in Kopavogur
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAbout 4.15 am I went outside to get fresh air, I looked up to the sky in north direction and saw a very bright white flashing light,I found it strange and kept looking, and after about 5 seconds it flashed again very brightly,Iam absolutely sure it was not jet or satellite, the flash of the light was so strong,I saw 2 bright flashes, Iam not sure if it was single object that moved or if it was two objects flashing one time each, and there was absolutely no sound. If it was a single object it had traveled a very long distance from nort to south in a short time,compared to a jet it traveled at least 10 times faster.
Summary: Bright flashing light in ths sky
